page.title: 17Club Membership Mickleton
page.content: This information was given by 40 fam- ilies of children at Mickleton school. {There was membership of the following: Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts,Youth Club,Over 60's,Golf,Weston Friendship, Cricket,Bowling,Hockey,Football,Watch (GTNC),Territorial Army,Gardening, Motoring(MG),Parents Association,Brit- ish Legion,Group 4 Social Club,Tennis. {Membership:Local Administration and {Charities.}Junior Playing Field,Play- group,Parish Council,Poors Land Char- ity,Amnesty International,R.A.S.E., National Farmers Union,Action Research Royal-Moreton-and Three Counties Shows Special Constabulary,Parochial Church Council,School Governors. {Family Place of Worship}Mickleton,St Lawrence22,Methodist Chapel 9;Ebring- ton,St Eadburgha1;Longboro'St James 1 Clifford Chambers,St Helen 1;Emissar- ies of the Divine Light 1;None 12.
